scriptsComments.commandsAbove: Will set NODE_ENV temporarily just for the app to run.
scriptsComments.prod: Will set NODE_ENV temporarily just for the app to run. To run this in powershell command line terminal, use this line but do not escape the characters as is done here- $env:NODE_ENV="development"; npm start
scriptsComments.dev: the dev script lets us see all logs

devDependenciesComments.prettier: to install prettier i ran this command in powershell npm install --save-dev prettier eslint-plugin-prettier eslint-config-prettier
devDependenciesComments.eslint: to install eslint i ran this command in powershell npm install eslint --save-dev
devDependenciesComments.init: to initilize eslint i ran npx eslint --init
